title: Black Screen After Launch
body:
Every time I click "Launch" The Screen Goes Black,(Which it should be the sign in page). 
ANY Suggestions on how to fix it?
Thank You

replies.body: The black screen you're seeing usually indicates a network issue that's having trouble connecting and downloading assets.  I recommend using our[ connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide, which will provide a series of steps to get this resolved.  Let me know if you have any questions!
How do I fix the connection problem then. I don't know what is wrong with my internet.
